# removeObserver(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the specified object from the list of objects to notify when the picker configuration changes.

## Declaration

```swift
func removeObserver(_ observer: any PKToolPickerObserver)
```

## Parameters

- **observer**: The object to stop sending notifications to.

## Detecting changes to the picker

- **addObserver(_:)**: Adds the specified object to the list of objects to notify when the picker configuration changes.
- **PKToolPickerObserver**: An interface you use to detect when the user changes the selected tools and drawing characteristics of a tool picker object.
